title: Disconnecting for 5 seconds but able to see what's going in game
body:
Hello riot,
I have been disconnecting from the game for 5 seconds but I'm able to see what's going on. I just can't move. The same has been occurring for many other people in the game that I've played in. I would like to know exactly what is going on with the riot servers as I'm quite sure it isn't an internet problem if it happens to many others, even those who live close to NA servers.

You guys earn a lot I know, but wouldn't it be a lot better if you could invest more in your servers?

ty

replies.body: I wasn't able to find a record of issues with the gameservers lately on NA. This certainly sounds like packet loss or high packet buffering, which can affect multiple players in a game if their connections take the same network route to the server. Is this still happening or did it only happen in this one match?

It constantly happened for days. It's fixed now.
The problem was packet loss.

To other players :-

Incase you see packet loss, don't play.

To check packet loss, Open cmd and type ping 104.160.131.3

and it'll show you your ping/packetloss stats
